review: If you plug the usb power cable into the TV, the Roku streaming stick powers on and off with the TV. This would be great if the Roku didn't reboot every time. You have to log back in to all of your accounts over and over again.
author: Pete Zoucha

review: Now I can have my content anywhere in the house. Plug and play, it just works without getting trapped in a proprietary system.
author: Jim Simonson

review: I would recommend this to anyone that doesn't have a lot of space as it fits right in the back of the tv.  Set up is very easy to understand only takes a few minutes.

review: I have always had an xbox and access to hulu and netflix. This wasnt for me it was a gift for my mother who received it yesterday and is already in love with it. Great audio and video quality. Definitely recommemd roku over any competitor. Especially good and easy to use for those old folks in our lives haha.

review: Functions just as a Roku box would. I am satisfied with the performance. Great Portability, easier to take with you and set up elsewhere.
